title: Turning to immunosuppressive tumors: Deciphering the immunosenescence-related microenvironment and prognostic characteristics in pancreatic cancer, in which GLUT1 contributes to gemcitabine resistance
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Si-Yuan Lu, Qiong-Cong Xu, De-Liang Fang, Yin-Hao Shi, Ying-Qin Zhu, Zhi-De Liu, Ming-Jian Ma, Jing-Yuan Ye, Xiao Yu Yin
